column1: #Text=Main Aang Appa Katara Mai Momo Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Ozai ( in dreams ) says : " Minor Azula Guru Pathik ( hallucination ) Mai 's house servants " Ty Lee says : " I 'm so excited to spend the weekend on Ember Island .
#Text=We 're being sent away on a forced vacation .
#Text=So Dad wants to meet with his advisers alone , without anyone else around .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Does n't your family have a house on Ember Island ?
#Text=" Azula says : " We used to come every summer when we were kids .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " That must have been fun !
#Text=" Zuko says : " That was a long time ago .
